tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Black Jet
programme.desc: Harm and Mac are sent to Teheran, Iran to represent a Navy flier whose Stealth jet crashed in Iran due to a major mechanical failure.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Silent Service
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are having trouble relating...a result of working together under stress for so long.(n)

programme.title: JAG: King of the Greenie Board
programme.desc: Harm is now a Tomcat division commander aboard the carrier USS Patrick Henry that is patrolling the Mediterranean near Yugoslavia.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Faire is Foul
programme.desc: For Sylvester's birthday, Team Scorpion visits a renaissance festival, but the revelry is cut short when a group tries to rob a nearby police evidence locker.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It's Raining Men (Of War)
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Team Scorpion's new neighbor, Florence \, joins them at sea on a mission to destroy a floating island of trash, but her flawed contribution leaves her, Walter and Happy stranded on the quickly dissolving island.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Beaumanor Hall Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Codnor Castle Part 1
programme.desc: The team venture into a cottage where it is said ‘no living soul can endure living there’. With\ncursed dolls, murder and suicide this derelict place has everything to fear.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Codnor Castle Part 2
programme.desc: We stay with the team and find out what happened after we left them last time. The\nforeboding Codnor Castle Cottage maintains its attack on the Most Haunted team with\ndramatic effect causing Yvette calls an early end to their night in Hell House.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Dudley Castle
programme.desc: The ruins that make up Dudley Castle house a plethora of paranormal activity for Yvette and\nher team to investigate. Strange noises and a violent poltergeist await them as they turn the\nlights out and do battle with the unseen forces.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Touched By Evil
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to The Southern Mansion in Cape May, NJ, and have enlisted the help of Dave Tango's father, Bruce.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted Town
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS investigates the entire town of Alexandria, Louisiana, where paranormal activity seems to lurk around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Spirits of the Night
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS visits the home of the Scully family, who are so terrified they are ready to pack up and move.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 2
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.174
programme.desc: A hit-and-run, drug charges, and an alleged bailout leave a teenager suing her ex-roommate’s boyfriend for a loan. He claims he never asked for her help.\t\t\t\r\nA woman claims her former friend racked up charges on a rental car that was in her name.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.57
programme.desc: A father of four denies owing his ex-lover for bail after being\t\t\t\r\narrested for violating a restraining order filed by his estranged wife/A tattoo artist demands that a former customer pay for the balance on an unfinished tattoo.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.68
programme.desc: A teenager accuses her former live-in fiancé of assault after she allegedly catches him with another woman; she sues him for rent, security deposit, and bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.163
programme.desc: A man and his 16-year-old daughter move in with her 20-year-old boyfriend who later sues them for rent and eviction fees; they accuse him of stealing their property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.50
programme.desc: Man alleges assault by ex-fiancée, sues for damages and unpaid loan for her schooling/Former live-in lover sues estranged husband for over $4,000 in personal loans and child support.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.255
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex of drug use; he denies it and any owed money. Police intervene in ex-friends' fight over a boy's paintball gun. Dispute over basketball school tuition refund.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.102
programme.desc: A luau-themed birthday party incites a group assault between two sisters and other partygoers; organizers claims the sisters were not originally invited to the party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.161
programme.desc: A 57-year-old man is accused of sexually propositioning a teenage grocery cashier; he sues her for money she allegedly promised to pay back. A teenager sues her father for the return of furniture that she claims was a Christmas gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.164
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute maxed-out credit card from alleged gambling binge. Daughter sues father convicted of domestic violence for unpaid attorney fees.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.61
programme.desc: A teenager refuses to take a drug test after denying charges that he smashed a car window and stole a neighbor’s belongings/A female nail technician sues a cosmetologist for money allegedly paid toward an apprenticeship.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The all-star black jacket brigade has been revealed and now only five chefs remain. Chef Ramsay calls on some of the biggest all-stars in professional sports for a cooking challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Four all-star chefs compete against each other in a holiday dish challenge judged by visiting family members. With a tie declared, Chef Ramsay steps in to crown the winner of a lunch at Saddle Peak Lodge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay announces that Nick, Michelle and Benjamin must design and cook a five-course menu. After tasting them, he announces that all three finalists will move forward.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Michelle and Benjamin compete to be the winner of the first ever Hell's Kitchen all-stars, and the head chef at Gordon Ramsay's Hell's Kitchen Restaurant at Caesar's Palace in Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Natural Liar
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. But with Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put their hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put the discussion on hold while they repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high-speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Unwanted Seizures
programme.desc: First, Lou sends Sonia and Matt to repo a Toyota Corolla from a recently divorced debtor determined to keep the car she won in the divorce. Later, Lou cuts a repo short to send Froy and Matt to tail a car until the debtor realizes he's being followed. And.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pepper Spray and Guns
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia douse a couple with a dose of pepper spray when the debtor gets too pushy with Sonia. Next, Matt and Froy battle biker girls when going after a motorcycle. And Finally, Matt and Froy confront a couple of delinquents.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: A.I. Rising
programme.desc: The relationship between a human and android spirals out of control with shocking consequences.(n)

programme.title: Rob Zombie's Halloween
programme.desc: Michael Meyers is released from the mental institution where he was committed for 17 years, and goes on a rampage to find his younger sister. No one is safe.(n)

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.(n)

programme.title: Assassination
programme.desc: When an ex-CIA agent discovers his family have been kidnapped, he sets out to rescue them, only to find they are being held hostage and won't be released unless he carries out a mission to assassinate the President.(n)

programme.title: Legend of the Red Dragon
programme.desc: A young father and his infant son are beset by forces of evil and corruption. They wander China, upholding their sense of honor and protecting the weak. When they are forced into combat, spectacular and hilarious fast-motion kung fu sequences follow.(n)

programme.title: Blood Out
programme.desc: In the vein of TRAINING DAY, STREET KINGS, and AMERICAN GANGSTER - Curtis 50 CENT Jackson, Val Kilmer, and Vinnie Jones star in a new action packed film filled with good cop/bad cop vengeance!(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Sitters
programme.desc: Facing holiday flight delays, two parents double-book incompatible babysitters: the mother's lawyer friend, Nora, and the dad's half-brother, Max, to look after their kids. An attraction grows and it seems a Christmas miracle might be on the cards.(n)

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding
programme.desc: A month before their wedding, on Christmas Day, Emily is called away for business. When Emily is due to return, a major storm hits making it impossible for her to leave. Emily desperately tries to make it home while Ben gets his act together.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Beauty
programme.desc: A pretty, successful masseuse and spa owner pays the price for being a good Samaritan when the young woman she helps turns out to be a ruthless killer.(n)

programme.title: A Sister’s Obsession
programme.desc: Kendra’s life couldn’t be more perfect – she has a loving husband, supportive best friend, and a blossoming career… and she was just awarded the title of "Educator of the Year.(n)

programme.title: Dark Minds
programme.desc: A twisted psychological thriller about a man haunted by his past.(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: A troubled war veteran assumes a new identity and becomes a vigilante in a bid to atone for his sins.(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: During the 1930s and '40s, wealthy industrialist Howard Hughes (Leonardo DiCaprio) gains fame as a movie producer, airplane designer and pilot.(n)

programme.title: John Wayne: Guns Along The Trail
programme.desc: A government agent goes undercover in a traveling medicine show to infiltrate a gang of counterfeiters. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Marion Burns, Reed Howes.(n)

programme.title: John Wayne: Gold Strike River
programme.desc: A tough guy and cranky friend strike it rich on a gold claim and become the target of ruthless assayers. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Eleanor Hunt, George "Gabby" Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Angel And The Badman
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in. Starring: John Wayne, Gail Russell, Harry Carey.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Airplane Mode
programme.desc: Horny American teenagers fly to Australia for sex at the social media convention in Sydney. Will Logan survive his fear of flying? Will the pilots survive passengers not using airplane mode? Will anyone survive? Feat: Logan Paul.(n)

programme.title: The Chaperone
programme.desc: Ray’s been asked to chaperone a school trip with his daughter Sally’s class. When characters from Ray’s criminal past believe he stole the loot from a bank they robbed, Ray will do whatever it takes to keep his daughter and her class out of harms way.(n)

programme.title: To the Public Danger
programme.desc: Four people meet in a pub and enjoy alcohol fuelled thrill seeking until things get out of hand and each person faces a moral choice with long-lasting consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
programme.desc: A quiet tenant at a London boarding house is suspected of being Jack the Ripper in Alfred Hitchcock's silent classic.(n)

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: In 1950s London racial hostility to Commonwealth immigrants is openly paraded. Scotland Yard detectives probe the racially motivated murder of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Broken Circle
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) fights to stop Rebecca (Sarah Wynter) from killing Greg Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery), whom she believes is responsible for her sister's murder.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Monsters!/A Small Talent for War/A Matter of Minutes
programme.sub-title: Monsters!/A Small Talent for War/A Matter of Minutes
programme.desc: Young monster fan meets alleged vampire neighbor/Alien threatens humanity, nations rush disarmament/Couple finds empty street with strange workers.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Welcome to Winfield
programme.desc: A grim reaper tracking a fleeing young man whose soul he is collecting follows the trail to a town seemingly from the Old West.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Leprechaun Artist/Dead Run
programme.desc: Vacationing in the United States, an Irish leprechaun is caught by three boys. To be freed, he must grant them three wishes/A truck driver accepts a job to deliver souls to Hell.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Crossing
programme.desc: A stressed-out priest repeatedly encounters a station wagon containing a young girl. The car keeps crashing and bursting into flames.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 2
programme.desc: SCIU has surrounded the 5th Ward with troops and an electric shield that prevents them from leaving. Caleb has a virus that can turn the human population into abnormals. Magnus enacts her ultimate plan for the Sanctuary network.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 1
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 1.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 2
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 2.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fata Morgana
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus, her daughter Ashley, and new to the Sanctuary, Dr. Will Zimmerman release three women from a mysterious crypt in Scotland, bringing them back to the Sanctuary for refuge.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)
